ConceptDef.label: Meditation schedule
ConceptDef.helpText: You can assign your colonists to meditate on a specific schedule.\n\nOpen the SCHEDULE tab, select the 'Meditate' assignment and click-drag the times when you want someone to meditate.

ConceptDef.label: Meditation desired psyfocus
ConceptDef.helpText: You can set a desired psyfocus level for each colonist. To do this, select a colonist with psylink, and click on their psyfocus bar.\n\nIf a colonist's psyfocus is below their desired level, they will meditate automatically during the "Anything" time assignment.
